PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.description: Your privacy matters to us. Learn how we protect and handle your personal information.

about.title: About This Policy
about.description: This Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your information when you use our Service. By using our Service, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.

service.title: Service
service.description: Refers to the Chanomhub website accessible at https://chanomhub.online/

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.description: Any information relating to an identified or identifiable individual

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.description: Data collected automatically through your use of the Service

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Small data files stored on your device by websites

user.title: You/User
user.description: The individual or entity accessing or using the Service

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: We may collect personally identifiable information that you voluntarily provide:

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Information
automatic.description: When you use our Service, we may automatically collect:

social.title: Third-Party Social Media Integration
social.description: If you choose to connect your account through social media platforms (Google, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn), we may access information associated with those accounts in accordance with their respective privacy policies and your authorization settings.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.description: We may use your information for various legitimate business purposes:

items.provide: Providing, maintaining, and improving our Service
items.manage: Managing your account and user experience
items.analyze: Analyzing usage patterns to enhance Service

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.description: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

providers.title: Service Providers
providers.description: With trusted third-party vendors who assist in operating our Service

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.description: When required by law, court order, or government authority

transfers.title: Business Transfers
transfers.description: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: When you have given explicit permission

public.title: Public Areas
public.description: Information you choose to share publicly may be visible to other users

safety.title: Safety and Security
safety.description: To protect rights, property, or safety of users and the public

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic website functionality and security.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Remember your preferences and settings for a personalized experience.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

note.title: Note
note.description: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy, to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
contact.response: We will respond to your inquiries within a reasonable timeframe and in accordance with applicable law.

compliance.title: Legal Compliance
compliance.description: This Privacy Policy is designed to comply with various privacy laws and regulations. The specific rights and protections available to you may vary depending on your location and the applicable legal framework.
